channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 03:16 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Zolotonoskiy district
item.description: 🟡 03:16 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Zolotonoskiy district#Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
